definition: to throw sth a long distance/to hurl/to throw at/to throw (dice etc)/to flip (a coin)
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

sentences.english: The figure is from a statue of the king standing in a boat throwing a harpoon.
sentences.chinese: 这件雕像雕刻的是古埃及法老站在一艘船上投掷鱼叉。

sentences.english: They threw eggs, sticks, bottles and a fire extinguisher at the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们向警察投掷了鸡蛋，木棍，酒瓶和一些灭火器。

sentences.english: My hat of general boy is taken off , is execute juggle for a short time, throw a shape besides doing the past window.
sentences.chinese: 我将男孩的帽子摘下，小施手技，作往窗外投掷状。

sentences.english: A bottle of spirits was launched in his direction but narrowly missed.
sentences.chinese: 向他投掷了一瓶烈酒，但有惊无险。

sentences.english: It was released in January after an apparent ransom was parachuted aboard the vessel.
sentences.chinese: 一个月后，在赎金用降落伞投掷到船上后，它被放回。

sentences.english: Shea thinks our ancestors threw rocks pretty well.
sentences.chinese: 谢伊认为我们的祖先投掷石块的本领相当不错。

sentences.english: Discus throw is an ancient game among the throwing events.
sentences.chinese: 掷铁饼是投掷项目中一项古老的比赛。

sentences.english: The cruel boy threw stones at the frogs.
sentences.chinese: 那一个狠毒的男孩用石块投掷田鸡。

sentences.english: Then it began to throw small stones, covered in snow, at the fifth window.
sentences.chinese: 然后她开始朝第五个窗口投掷裹着雪的小石头。

sentences.english: Mair says that the throwing shoulder does not lose as much external rotation.
sentences.chinese: 考古博士说，投掷肩不丧失尽量外旋。

sentences.english: One of the photographers threw stones at the settlers.
sentences.chinese: 录像上，一名摄影记者向定居者投掷石块。

sentences.english: Riot police hurled tear gas canisters and smoke bombs into the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察向人群中投掷了催泪瓦斯罐和烟幕弹。

sentences.english: A rock-throwing battle erupted between the two sides.
sentences.chinese: 双方之间爆发了一场投掷石块互相攻击的战斗。

sentences.english: He felt fate throw another shaft .
sentences.chinese: 一下子他感到命运又向他投掷出一支矛枪。

sentences.english: When you throw Mad Milk, it does have a chance to Crit. However, this makes no difference to its effects whatsoever.
sentences.chinese: 对敌人投掷抓狂牛奶不像瓶手道能获得助攻分数。

definition: to catapult/to launch/to eject (from a plane)/to shoot
to throw an explosive charge/to bomb
to fire/to discharge/to release (fireworks, smokescreen, poison gas, virus etc)
